name: medical-device-fargate-deployment
description: CDK TypeScript project to deploy Medical Device Streamlit App to AWS Fargate

scripts.deploy: npm install && npx cdk bootstrap && npx cdk deploy --require-approval never --outputs-file cdk/outputs.json && npm run update-env
scripts.update-env:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const o=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('cdk/outputs.json')); const s=o.MedicalDeviceAppFargateStackV2; const alb=s.ExportMedicalDeviceAppserviceendpoint; const username=s.ExportMedicalDeviceAppauthusername; const password=s.ExportMedicalDeviceAppauthpassword; fs.writeFileSync('.env', 'ENABLE_AUTHENTICATION=true
AUTH_TYPE=basic
BASIC_AUTH_USERNAME=' + username + '
BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD=' + password + '
AWS_DEFAULT_REGION=us-east-1
'); console.log('✅ Basic Auth configured - Username: ' + username + ', Password: ' + password + '
✅ AWS endpoint: http://' + alb);"
